title: Ukraine and Russia trade blame for breaking 'Easter truce'
snippets: Kyiv reports many cases of Russian shelling, while Moscow speaks of Ukrainian drone attacks during a truce that has now expired.
titles: Ukraine and Russia trade blame for breaking 'Easter truce'
summary: During the recently expired truce, Kyiv reported multiple instances of Russian shelling, whereas Moscow claimed it was targeted by Ukrainian drone attacks. This exchange of hostilities underscores the ongoing tension and conflict between Ukraine and Russia despite the temporary ceasefire.

title: Could AI text alerts help save snow leopards from extinction?
snippets: In Pakistan, it's hoped newly-developed AI cameras could warn villagers via text to move their livestock if snow leopards enter the area.
titles: Could AI text alerts help save snow leopards from extinction?
summary: In Pakistan, a new initiative has introduced AI cameras designed to protect livestock by alerting villagers through text messages if snow leopards are detected nearby. This technology aims to prevent conflicts between wildlife and local communities by providing timely warnings to move animals to safety.

title: At least two dead as severe weather sweeps US South and Midwest
snippets: Flooding hit parts of the US South and Midwest during the Easter holiday weekend.
titles: At least two dead as severe weather sweeps US South and Midwest
summary: During the Easter holiday weekend, several regions in the US South and Midwest experienced significant flooding. This weather event affected numerous communities across these areas, disrupting holiday plans and causing widespread water damage.

title: Israeli army only finds ‘professional failures’ in Gaza aid worker killings
snippets: The Palestine Red Crescent Society denounced the Israeli report as 'full of lies'.
titles: Israeli army only finds ‘professional failures’ in Gaza aid worker killings
summary: The Palestine Red Crescent Society has publicly criticized an Israeli report, dismissing it as "full of lies." This statement indicates a strong disagreement with the findings or claims presented in the Israeli document, although specific details of the report or the points of contention were not provided in the summary.

title: Real Madrid keep LaLiga defence alive with late goal against Athletic Club
snippets: Defending champions Real Madrid net an injury-time win in 1-0 victory against Athletic Club to keep pace with Barcelona.
titles: Real Madrid keep LaLiga defence alive with late goal against Athletic Club
summary: Real Madrid secured a 1-0 victory over Athletic Club with a goal in injury time, maintaining their position in the league race closely behind Barcelona. This win ensures the defending champions keep pace in their title defense.

title: Breaking down Pro Football Network's new 7-round mock draft for the Texans
snippets: In Pro Football Network's newest mock draft, the Texans shore up both sides of the line and bring in a pair of weapons to upgrade the pass game.
titles: Breaking down Pro Football Network's new 7-round mock draft for the Texans
summary: In Pro Football Network's latest mock draft, the Houston Texans focus on strengthening their team by selecting players for both their offensive and defensive lines. Additionally, they aim to enhance their passing game by acquiring two new weapons, indicating a strategic approach to improve team performance on multiple fronts.

title: Reds' Austin Wynns records six-hit game as part of 24-run blowout over Orioles
snippets: Wynns is the fifth player in franchise history to hit that landmark
titles: Reds' Austin Wynns records six-hit game as part of 24-run blowout over Orioles
summary: Wynns has become the fifth player in the franchise's history to reach a significant milestone. This achievement places him among the top performers in the team's record books.

title: Brewers set franchise record with six stolen bases in a single inning vs. Athletics
snippets: The MLB record is eight stolen bags in an inning, set in 1915
titles: Brewers set franchise record with six stolen bases in a single inning vs. Athletics
summary: In 1915, a Major League Baseball (MLB) record was established for the most stolen bases in a single inning, with a total of eight stolen bases. This record remains unbroken to date.

title: WrestleMania 41 results: Iyo Sky defends WWE Championship with electric win over Bianca Belair, Rhea Ripley
snippets: Iyo Sky reminded the world why she's the Women's World Champion, blowing the roof off Allegiant Stadium with Bianca Belair and Rhea Ripley to kick off WrestleMania 41, Night 2.
titles: WrestleMania 41 results: Iyo Sky defends WWE Championship with electric win over Bianca Belair, Rhea Ripley
summary: Iyo Sky successfully defended her Women's World Championship at WrestleMania 41, Night 2, in a highly praised match against Bianca Belair and Rhea Ripley at Allegiant Stadium. Her performance underscored her status as champion and was a highlight of the event.

title: West Virginia Mountaineers: Transfer 101: Christian Hamilton
snippets: Breaking down everything you need to know about the transfer of North Carolina wide receiver Christian Hamilton to WVU.
titles: West Virginia Mountaineers: Transfer 101: Christian Hamilton
summary: North Carolina wide receiver Christian Hamilton has transferred to West Virginia University (WVU). This move adds a significant talent to WVU's football team, as Hamilton is known for his impressive performance on the field. The news covers the potential impact of Hamilton's transfer on the team's future games and highlights his achievements while playing for North Carolina.

title: Israeli military admits ‘professional failures’ in killing of Gaza medics
snippets: IDF says a commanding officer will be reprimanded and a deputy commander dismissed over inaccurate accounts
titles: Israeli military admits ‘professional failures’ in killing of Gaza medics
summary: The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) announced disciplinary actions against two officers following inaccurate accounts. A commanding officer will be reprimanded, and a deputy commander will be dismissed for their roles in providing incorrect information.

title: UAE set to use AI to write laws in world first
snippets: Gulf state expects move will speed up lawmaking by 70% but experts warn of ‘reliability’ issues with artificial intelligence
titles: UAE set to use AI to write laws in world first
summary: A Gulf state anticipates that incorporating artificial intelligence (AI) into its lawmaking process will increase efficiency by 70%. However, experts have expressed concerns regarding the reliability of AI in this context, suggesting potential issues may arise from its use.

title: Republican senator backs Powell over Trump attacks on Fed
snippets: Banking committee member John Kennedy says US central bank ‘ought to be independent’
titles: Republican senator backs Powell over Trump attacks on Fed
summary: Senator John Kennedy, a member of the banking committee, expressed his belief that the US central bank should maintain its independence. This statement underscores the importance of the central bank operating without political interference to ensure its decisions on monetary policy are made in the best interest of the economy.

title: Global confidence slumps as trade turmoil looms over IMF meetings
snippets: Tariff shock and market slide are among rising threats to growth, Brookings-FT Tiger index shows
titles: Global confidence slumps as trade turmoil looms over IMF meetings
summary: The Brookings-FT Tiger index indicates a growing risk to global economic growth due to tariff shocks and market slides. This comprehensive analysis suggests that these factors could significantly hinder economic expansion worldwide.

title: Reeves to press case for global free trade in US talks
snippets: Chancellor also hopes to get better tariff deal for UK in meeting with Treasury secretary Scott Bessent
titles: Reeves to press case for global free trade in US talks
summary: In a recent development, the UK Chancellor is set to meet with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent with the aim of negotiating a more favorable tariff deal for the UK. This meeting is part of ongoing efforts to enhance trade relations between the UK and its international partners.
